market: ^The market is quiet, not surprisingly. Your father insists that you be up early, but the rest of the people in this small village seem to enjoy their sleep.

c-0: ^You are bored, but there is one thing that always cheers you up: the garden!
c-1:
^No one would notice if you dozed off for a little and then went home...right?


^[See what Baba is up to]

end
